txt.en: 'If this is a trick, I will send you to your end, [placeholder].'
'Say no more. This is a simple choice between life or death.'
Not all of the Corsairs in Abadec's Watch are willing to continue fighting.

'Some of the Corsairs who have flocked to Abadec's Watch seek safety rather than a cause to continue fighting. If you find any Corsairs who seem hesitant to draw their weapons, please convince them to find me. I promise to help them find peace in Gondor, or a safe voyage home to Umbar.'
'Thank you for helping me convince them, [placeholder]. I hope we can put the days of war behind us, for the sake of both of our peoples.'
Convince weary Corsairs to leave Abadec's Watch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Dolvir outside Abadec's Watch
'Against my better judgement, I shall trust you.'
Convince weary Corsairs to leave Abadec's Watch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dolvir has asked you to convince war-weary Corsairs to seek him out for help.\n\nYou can find weary Corsairs in Abadec's Watch in the south-west corner of Belfalas.
You have successfully convinced many weary Corsairs to leave Abadec's Watch.\n\nDolvir waits for you amongst the trees to the north of the camp. You should talk to him.
'I will set foot upon the shores of Umbar again, I swear it.'
